_sText:
A funny little map where everything looks a like a being made for hamsters!
For example you can open doors by making a hamster wheel rotate :D

- Has buyzones and some weapons lying around
- You bounce when falling down
- Fullbright on purpose (gives you the 1.5 feeling :D)

(Sry for multiple submission but I always thought the server froze or sth because my browser didn't show any progress in ages! Usually uploading doesn't take so long so I treid again... and again)
